imv.name: Flickr
imv.description: From snowy landscapes in the winter, to sunny beaches in the summer, spice up your conversation with the some of the most interesting seasonal photos on Flickr.

imv.name: The Thread
imv.description: Do you love celebrity style? Then watch the Thread while you chat. The Thread brings you the hottest styles from your favorite TV shows, movies and music videos.

imv.name: Emoticats
imv.description: Love emoticons? Now you can adopt an "Emoticat®" as your display image or just insert one into your conversation. Open it up and start turning the cat photos into emoticons by zooming in on each cat!

imv.name: Fishtank
imv.description: Looking for a virtual fish tank to calm your day? Download our Fishtank IMVironment and watch the colorful fishes swim around effortlessly. A great way to relieve stress as you chat with a friend or have it open in your desktop while you work.
